dct_title_s: Carte pour conduire a l'inteligence de l'histoire sacrèe, qui renferme en abrege la genealogie, la geographie, et la chronologie de l'histoire sainte
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Each map has a bar scale.
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
All the maps are surrounded by text: [Geneological, geographical, and chronological explanations].
Appears in Atlas historique. Amsterdam : l'Honoré et Chatelain Libraires, 1720.
